body:
I install tiller by "helm init --service-account tiller --tiller-image docker.io/sapcc/tiller:v2.7.2 --skip-refresh"
and i have a running pod named"tiller-deploy"
and,when i use "helm version",it print：

Client: &version.Version{SemVer:"v2.7.2", GitCommit:"8478fb4fc723885b155c924d1c8c410b7a9444e6", GitTreeState:"clean"}
Server: &version.Version{SemVer:"v2.7.2", GitCommit:"8478fb4fc723885b155c924d1c8c410b7a9444e6", GitTreeState:"clean"}

but,when i use "helm ls" it return:

 Get http://localhost:8080/api/v1/namespaces/kube-system/configmaps?labelSelector=OWNER%3DTILLER: dial tcp [::1]:8080: getsockopt: connection refused

and i also can't use other orders like  search.
the log of pod is :

[main] 2018/02/07 09:28:03 Starting Tiller v2.7.2 (tls=false)
[main] 2018/02/07 09:28:03 GRPC listening on :44134
[main] 2018/02/07 09:28:03 Probes listening on :44135
[main] 2018/02/07 09:28:03 Storage driver is ConfigMap
[main] 2018/02/07 09:28:03 Max history per release is 0
[storage] 2018/02/07 09:42:24 listing all releases with filter
[storage/driver] 2018/02/07 09:42:24 list: failed to list: Get http://localhost:8080/api/v1/namespaces/kube-system/configmaps?labelSelector=OWNER%3DTILLER: dial tcp [::1]:8080: getsockopt: connection refused

so sad.
anybody who can help me
